name: N8N
description: I use n8n frequently for automating tasks and integrating various services. I'm comfortable creating workflows that connect APIs, databases, and other tools to streamline processes.

name: Docker
description: I use docker for containerizing applications, ensuring consistent environments across development and production. I'm familiar with creating Dockerfiles, managing containers, and using Docker Compose for multi-container applications.

name: React
description: I use React Library for building user interfaces, particularly single-page applications. I'm a beginner in React and have experience with components, state management, and hooks.

name: Figma
description: I use Figma for designing user interfaces and prototyping. I'm comfortable creating wireframes, interactive prototypes, and collaborating with developers to implement designs.
